verification_code_description: The verification code has been sent to your email. Please check {email} (including the spam folder) and enter the verification code in the box below.

change_password_succcess_description: Your password has been successfully changed
password_confirm_password_not_match: Password and Confirm Password do not match
logout_alert_description: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirm_mark_all_as_read_description: Are you sure you want to mark all notifications as read?, this action cannot be undone
update_profile_success_description: Your profile has been successfully updated
error_alert_description: Something went wrong, please try again
password_invalid: Invalid password, password must be at least {length} characters
current_password_invalid: Current password is invalid, password must be at least {length} characters
new_password_invalid: New password is invalid, password must be at least {length} characters

split_warning_equally: Choose at least 1 person to split

delete_group_success_description: You have successfully deleted the group

edit_expenses_success_alert_description: You have successfully edited the expenses
system_maintenance_description:
We're currently performing scheduled maintenance. The system will be back online soon.
Thank you for your  patience.
system_error_description:
We encountered an error while trying to connect with our server.
Please try after some time.
session_expired_description: Your session has expired. Please login again
update_require_description: A new version of the app is available. Please update to continue using the app
onboarding_1_description: Quickly and accurately calculate and divide expenses for every meal, event, or trip with friends.
onboarding_2_description: Helps you avoid unnecessary arguments over money with friends. Everything is clearly and transparently recorded.
onboarding_3_description: Efficiently manage debts and shared expenses with friends. Check and remind about debts anytime, anywhere.
update_profile_friend_success_descriptio: Your friend's profile has been successfully updated
empty_notifications_description: We will notify you when there are changes to activity.
empty_groups_description: Create a group to start splitting expenses with friends.
empty_groups_with_friend_title: You aren't in any group with friends
empty_groups_with_friend_description: Add friends to the group to start splitting expenses with friends
empty_no_expense_or_payment_description: Create an expense or payment to start splitting expenses with friends
empty_friend_description: Add friends to start splitting expenses with friends
limit_create_expense_option_ads_alert_de: Groups {count} and above need to watch rewarded ads or upgrade to Premium to continue.
iap_description: For regular users who want to do more
iap_content_1_description: Upgrade your plan to remove all ads and enjoy a smoother experience
iap_content_2_description: Create an expense with unlimited number of members in the group
iap_default_lifetime_note_title: Get Premium with no recurring fees
iap_script_lifetime_note_description: Get Premium with no recurring fees
delete_account_request_description: We will send a verification code to your email address
delete_account_confirm_description:
Deleting your account will delete all data in your account. Are you sure you want to proceed? 
This action cannot be undone.
delete_account_success_description:
Your account has been successfully deleted. 
All your data has been permanently removed from the app. Thank you for using our service
are_you_sure_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
alert_email_app_not_found_description: We could not open an email application on your device. Please install an email app to use the feedback feature.
restore_purchase_success_description: Your in-app purchases have been successfully restored and are ready for use.
purchase_error_description: An error occurred while processing your purchase. Please try again later
restore_error_description: An error occurred while restoring your purchase. Please try again later
purchase_success_description: Your purchase has been successfully processed. Thank you for your support
iap_restore_not_success_description: Your subscriptions have expired. Thank you for using our service
limit_create_expense_option_iap_alert_de: Groups of {count} or more need upgrade to Premium to proceed
token_expired_description: Your session has expired. Please login again
connection_error_description: An error occurred while trying to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again
email_not_yet_verified_description: Your email address has not been verified. Please verify your email address to continue using the app
please_input_total_amount_description: Enter the total amount of the expense
please_input_currency_description: Choose the currency for the total amount
please_input_group_description: Select a group for this expense
please_input_payer_description: Select a payer for this expense
please_input_date_description: Select the date of the expense
please_input_description_description: Enter a description for this expense
no_group_description: You haven’t created or joined any groups yet. Please create a new group or join an existing one to continue
auto_close_after_second: This page will automatically close in {second} seconds
delete_friend_success_description: You have successfully deleted the friend
limit_maximum_attachment_count_descripti: You are only allowed to upload up to {length} attachments per expense
delete_expenses_confirm_alert_descriptio: Are you sure you want to delete this expense?
attachments_invalid: Attachments have not been fully processed. Please check again.
attachments_resizing_invalid: Attachments are being processed. Please wait until the task is completed.
attachments_uploading_invalid: Attachments are being uploaded. Please wait until the task is completed.
attachments_error_invalid: An error occurred with the attachments. Please check again.

delete_payment_confirm_alert_description: Are you sure you want to delete this payment?

friend_added_success_description: You have successfully added a friend
group_created_success_description: You have successfully created a group
empty_debts_with_friend_detail_descripti: All expenses have been settled. There are no more items to share
iap_default_description: For regular users who want to do more
rate_app_choose_description: We’d love to hear your thoughts!
rate_app_good_description_ios: We're glad you're enjoying {app_name}! A quick rating on the App Store would mean the world to us!
rate_app_good_description_android: We're glad you're enjoying {app_name}! A quick rating on the Amazon Appstore would mean the world to us!
rate_app_bad_description: Sorry to hear your experience didn't meet expectations. We'd love your feedback to help us improve!
camera_not_available_description:
Could not access the camera on your device.
Please check your camera settings and try again
group_joined_success_description: You have successfully joined the group
regenerate_qr_code_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to regenerate the QR code?
regenerate_qr_code_confirm_description: Regenerating this QR code will deactivate the previous one, making it no longer usable
qr_code_share_add_friend_message: Scan this QR code to add me as a friend on Bill Splitter
qr_code_share_join_group_message: Scan this QR code to join the group on Bill Splitter
qr_code_save_to_gallery_success_descript: The QR code has been saved to your gallery
qr_code_save_to_gallery_error_descriptio: An error occurred while saving the QR code to your gallery
qr_warning_share_trust_people_profile:
Your code can be used by anyone to add you on Bill Splitter, so only share it with people you trust.
You can "Regenerate QR Code" to invalidate the previous code
qr_warning_share_trust_people_group:
This code can be used by anyone to join the group on Bill Splitter, so only share it with people you trust.
You can "Regenerate QR Code" to invalidate the previous code
simplify_group_debt_confirm_description: All selected users will be added back to the group.
simplify_group_debt_conflict_description: You cannot disable the ‘Simplify Debts’ feature because some members have already left the group. If you disable this feature, these members will incur debts with those still in the group. To disable the ‘Simplify Debts’ feature, you need to add the following people back to the group.
confirm_accept_request_merge_accounts_de: All data from the source account will be transferred to the destination account. This action cannot be undone.
confirm_reject_request_merge_accounts_de: The request will be denied and the account merge will not be performed.
confirm_cancel_request_merge_accounts_de: The request will be canceled and you can recreate another request later.
confirm_remove_request_merge_accounts_de: The request will be removed from the list. This action cannot be undone.
empty_my_create_request_description: You have not sent any requests
empty_my_need_action_request_description: You have no requests that need your action
email_already_used_alert_title: This email is already in use
email_already_used_alert_description: This email is already in use by another account. Would you like to merge {source_email} into {destination_email}?
select_destination_account_to_merge_desc: The action merges the debit data of the above account into the selected account. Once completed, the source account will be deleted and the destination account will have both data.
this_account_is_not_verified_description: You can change the email or combine this user with friends!
merge_request_created_success_descriptio:
The merge request has been successfully created. Please wait for the other party to accept the request.
You can check the status of the request in the Request list
merge_request_confirm_create_description: The request will be sent to the target account. Once accepted, the data (debts and loans, friends, groups) will be merged and the source account will be deleted.
merge_account_success_description: The data has been successfully merged
please_select_destination_account_to_mer: Please select destination account to merge
merge_request_reject_success_description: The merge request has been successfully rejected
merge_request_remove_success_description: The merge request has been successfully removed
join_group_as_member_in_group_title: Who are you in the list of members below? (Optional)
join_group_as_member_in_group_descriptio: Select a member from the list to merge their data (debts and loans, friends, groups) into your account. Once completed, their account will be deleted, and yours will replace it.
join_as_other_member_in_group_confirm_de: All data (debts and loans, friends, groups) will be merged into your account and the {name} account will be deleted.
restore_group_confirm_alert_description: Are you sure you want to restore this group?
restore_group_success_alert_description: You have successfully restored the group
premium_required_description: This feature is only available for Premium users. Upgrade to Premium to continue using this feature
all_notifications_marked_as_read: All notifications have been marked as read
